newsitem.title: UK: B.A.T gives more details on US tobacco deal.
newsitem.headline: B.A.T gives more details on US tobacco deal.

text.p: B.A.T Industries Plc on Monday disclosed further details about the likely impact of a landmark U.S. tobacco settlement on its Brown & Williamson Tobacco Corp unit.

The company said it expected Brown & Williamson to make an initial payment of about $1.7 billion out of the $10 billion that tobacco companies would pay under the deal when the proposal passes U.S. Congress.
